segment.source: title: Container Ecosystem
segment.target: title: Container Ecosystem

segment.source: Building a Container Ecosystem
segment.target: Building a Container Ecosystem

segment.source: 12-Nov update.
segment.target: 12-Nov update.

segment.source: To understand why building a container ecosystem is so important, let's first talk about Docker.
segment.target: To understand why building a container ecosystem is so important, let's first talk about Docker.

segment.source: Docker’s Appeal
segment.target: Docker’s Appeal

segment.source: The concept of containers (namespace isolation and resource governance) has been around for a long time, going back to BSD Jails, Solaris Zones and the basic UNIX chroot (change root) mechanism.
segment.target: The concept of containers (namespace isolation and resource governance) has been around for a long time, going back to BSD Jails, Solaris Zones and the basic UNIX chroot (change root) mechanism.

segment.source: What Docker has done is provide a common toolset, packaging model, and deployment mechanism.
segment.target: What Docker has done is provide a common toolset, packaging model, and deployment mechanism.

segment.source: By doing so, Docker greatly simplified the containerization and distribution of applications.
segment.target: By doing so, Docker greatly simplified the containerization and distribution of applications.

segment.source: Those applications can then run anywhere on any Linux host, a capability we're providing on Windows as well.
segment.target: Those applications can then run anywhere on any Linux host, a capability we're providing on Windows as well.

segment.source: This ubiquitous technology not only simplifies management by offering the same management commands against any host, it also creates a unique opportunity for seamless DevOps.
segment.target: This ubiquitous technology not only simplifies management by offering the same management commands against any host, it also creates a unique opportunity for seamless DevOps.

segment.source: From a developer’s desktop to a testing machine to a set of production machines, a Docker image can be created that will deploy identically across any environment in seconds.
segment.target: From a developer’s desktop to a testing machine to a set of production machines, a Docker image can be created that will deploy identically across any environment in seconds.

segment.source: This story has created a massive and growing ecosystem of applications packaged in Docker containers, with DockerHub, the public containerized-application registry that Docker maintains.
segment.target: This story has created a massive and growing ecosystem of applications packaged in Docker containers, with DockerHub, the public containerized-application registry that Docker maintains.

segment.source: Docker provides a great foundation for development.
segment.target: Docker provides a great foundation for development.

segment.source: Now let's talk about that ecosystem of applications and how you can build on Docker concepts to create a development and deployment workflow suited to your needs.
segment.target: Now let's talk about that ecosystem of applications and how you can build on Docker concepts to create a development and deployment workflow suited to your needs.

segment.source: Components in a container ecosystem
segment.target: Components in a container ecosystem

segment.source: Windows Server Containers are a key component of a large container ecosystem.
segment.target: Windows Server Containers are a key component of a large container ecosystem.

segment.source: We’re working across the industry to deliver developer choice at each layer of the solution stack.
segment.target: We’re working across the industry to deliver developer choice at each layer of the solution stack.

segment.source: The container ecosystem provides ways to manage containers, share containers and develop apps that run in containers.
segment.target: The container ecosystem provides ways to manage containers, share containers and develop apps that run in containers.

segment.source: Microsoft wants to empower developer choice and productivity as they build these next-gen apps.
segment.target: Microsoft wants to empower developer choice and productivity as they build these next-gen apps.

segment.source: Our goal is to fuel developer productivity which means enabling applications to target any Microsoft cloud without having to modify, rewrite, or reconfigure code.
segment.target: Our goal is to fuel developer productivity which means enabling applications to target any Microsoft cloud without having to modify, rewrite, or reconfigure code.

segment.source: Microsoft is committed to being open and ecosystem friendly.
segment.target: Microsoft is committed to being open and ecosystem friendly.

segment.source: We actively support the coming together of multiple developer ecosystems of interest – such as Windows and Linux – to drive innovation.
segment.target: We actively support the coming together of multiple developer ecosystems of interest – such as Windows and Linux – to drive innovation.

segment.source: Over the coming months, we will be providing more information about additional partners in this developing ecosystem.
segment.target: Over the coming months, we will be providing more information about additional partners in this developing ecosystem.

segment.source: Back to Container Home
segment.target: Back to Container Home
